attributes.action: Give Police officers permission to stop and search gangs for knifes
attributes.background: There has been a number of gang related knife crime robberies and attacks around the kingstanding and sutton coldfield areas relating to kids and adults it needs to stop children an adults dont feel safe on streets day or night!

rejection.details:
The police already have the power to stop and search, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You can find out more about the police's powers to stop and search here:

https://www.gov.uk/police-powers-to-stop-and-search-your-rights
